column4: Can anyone give me some tips for clearing up hard disk space on Ubuntu?
Is there a way to sort everything in the file system by size, for instance?
Dang! Good call people, that gave me like 400 MB

If you mean something like defragmenting on Windows, that's not neccessary with Linux filesystems. They write in a straight line. :P  However, there's a possibility that apt hasn't been auto-cleaning your packages after they're installed. It likes to archive them. Type apt-get clean and see if you free up some space.
